history.proof: intros f a. unfold ex_RInt. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_RInt_point.

exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a : R P : V -> Prop Unable to unify "locally zero P" with "locally (f a) P".

original: intros f a. unfold ex_RInt. exists (f a). apply is_RInt_point.
